titles.title: Protecting Our Rural Post Offices Act of 2011

To provide that the United States Postal Service may not close any post office that does not have another post office within 8 miles as measured by public roads with regular year-round access, and for other purposes.
Protecting Our Rural Post Offices Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Protecting Our Rural Post Offices Act of 2011 - Prohibits the United States Postal Service (USPS) from closing any post office that does not have another post office within eight miles as measured by public roads with regular year-round access.
